entry.title: ajax
entry.content:
ajax源码:


if(window.XMLHttpRequest){
    xmlHttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
}else if(windoe.ActionXObject){
    var actionName = ['MSXML2.XMLHTTP','Microsoft.XMLHTTP'];
    for(var i=0;i<actionName.length;i++){
        try{
            xmlHttp = new ActionXObject(actionName[i]);
        }catch(e){}
    }
}
if(!xmlHttp){
    console.log('xmlHttp对象创建失败');
}else{
    xmlHttp.onreadystatechange=callback;
    //xmlHttp.open('get','url',true);
    xmlHttp.open('post','url',true);
    xmlHttp.setHeadRequest('Content-type','appplication/x-www-form-urlencode');
    xmlHttp.send();
}
function callback(){
    if(xmlHttp.readyState){
        if(xmlHttp.status){
            var responseText = xmlHttp.responseText;
            //返回XML时
            //var responseXML = xmlHtpp.responseXML;
            //返回json时
            //responseText = eval('('+responseText+')');
        }
    }
}

entry.title: css水平垂直居中
entry.content:
4种将一个绝对定位元素水平垂直居中的方法

css代码:


.wrapper {
    height: 500px;
    position: relative;
    /*css3方法*/
    /*
     justify-content:center;/子元素水平居中/
     align-items:center;/子元素垂直居中/
     display:flex;
     */
}
/*Chrome,Firefox, Safari, Mobile Safari, IE8-10.*/
.div1 {
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    position: absolute;
    background: red;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    margin: auto;
    text-align: center;
}
/*******兼容IE6,7,流行方法*******/
.div2 {
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    position: absolute;
    background: blue;
    left: 50%;
    top: 50%;
    margin-left: -50px;
    margin-top: -50px;
}
/*不兼容IE8*/
.div3 {
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    position: absolute;
    background: red;
    left: 50%;
    top: 50%;
    /*
     -webkit-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);
     -ms-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);
     */
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}
/*水平方向居中*/
.div3 {
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    background: red;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
entry.summary:
4种将一个绝对定位元素水平垂直居中的方法
